steps.title: Draw two circles, make one circle bigger than the other.
steps.content: Draw two circles, make one circle bigger than the other. [1] X Research source [2] X Research source

steps.title: Connect the two circles by drawing curves to make the head.
steps.content: Connect the two circles by drawing curves to make the head.

steps.title: Draw a bigger circle followed by a smaller one for the body.
steps.content: Draw a bigger circle followed by a smaller one for the body. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Draw curves connecting the body with the head.
steps.content: Draw curves connecting the body with the head. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Draw pointed ovals for the ears and tail, draw a curve to connect the tail with the body.
steps.content: Draw pointed ovals for the ears and tail, draw a curve to connect the tail with the body.

steps.title: Draw a series of wide ovals above elongated thin ovals for the legs.
steps.content: Draw a series of wide ovals above elongated thin ovals for the legs.

steps.title: Draw blocky irregular rectangles for the hooves.
steps.content: Draw blocky irregular rectangles for the hooves.

steps.title: Add the face by making ovals for the eyes and nose; draw curves for the eyebrow and mouth; add two blocks below the mouth for the teeth.
steps.content: Add the face by making ovals for the eyes and nose; draw curves for the eyebrow and mouth; add two blocks below the mouth for the teeth. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Draw stripe outlines all over the body of the zebra.
steps.content: Draw stripe outlines all over the body of the zebra. [6] X Research source [7] X Research source

steps.title: Based on the outlines, draw the main body of the zebra.
steps.content: Based on the outlines, draw the main body of the zebra. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Shade the stripes and hooves of the zebra.
steps.content: Shade the stripes and hooves of the zebra.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color your zebra!
steps.content: Color your zebra!

steps.title: Draw an oval connected to a circle for the head.
steps.content: Draw an oval connected to a circle for the head.

steps.title: Draw two ovals above the head for the ears.
steps.content: Draw two ovals above the head for the ears.

steps.title: Draw a circle for the rear body.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the rear body.

steps.title: Draw curves connecting circle drawn previously to the head.
steps.content: Draw curves connecting circle drawn previously to the head.

steps.title: Draw curves for the mane and tail.
steps.content: Draw curves for the mane and tail. Add a pointed oval to complete the tail.

steps.title: Draw a series of elongated ovals for the legs.
steps.content: Draw a series of elongated ovals for the legs.

steps.title: Draw irregular blocks below the legs for the hooves.
steps.content: Draw irregular blocks below the legs for the hooves.

steps.title: Draw the stripes all over the body of the zebra.
steps.content: Draw the stripes all over the body of the zebra.

steps.title: Based on the outlines, draw the body of the zebra.
steps.content: Based on the outlines, draw the body of the zebra. Add a shaded oval for the eye.

steps.title: Shade the stripes, mouth area, ear, mane, tail and hooves.
steps.content: Shade the stripes, mouth area, ear, mane, tail and hooves.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
